body_html:
@fmassa I've found out the problem. It is the extension dir search process in run_test.py L107.
Can you do you a favor?

# Change this
            install_directory = os.path.dirname(install_directory) 
# into this
            import re
            install_regex = re.compile(r'\w+-packages')
            while not install_regex.match(os.path.basename(install_directory)):
                install_directory = os.path.dirname(install_directory) 
```.

body:
@fmassa I've found out the problem. It is the extension dir search process in `run_test.py` L107.
Can you do you a favor?
```python
# Change this
            install_directory = os.path.dirname(install_directory) 
# into this
            import re
            install_regex = re.compile(r'\w+-packages')
            while not install_regex.match(os.path.basename(install_directory)):
                install_directory = os.path.dirname(install_directory) 
```.
